document_data.name: Forgotten Crypt
document_data.mainbody: The '''Forgotten Crypt''' was a subterranean home of [[Velsharoon]] during his mortal life.
document_data.Description: Located deep within [[Skull Gorge]], the Forgotten Crypt was a large mausoleum constructed on top of the ruins of an ancient [[Netherese]] city.
document_data.Inhabitants: The crypt was inhabited by Velsharoon's clergy as of the 1370's [[DR]].
